job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pPenguinData Workforce Management Systems Inc is currently seeking a fulltime Software Engineer with at least 5 years of experience to work remotely with our team This person will work closely with our Senior Manager of Software Engineering and our Chief Information Officer to create software solutions and focus on the replatforming of our SaaS solution hosted in AWS You will work with internal staff to analyze and refine requirements develop solutions test and document code A strong background in application development and services development is requiredppnbspppBeing authorized to work in the US is a precondition of employment at PenguinData and we do not provide sponsorship for an employmentbased visa status at this timeppJob DutiespulliResearch design and development of new software programs or features on existing productsliliDevelopment testing monitoring and maintenance of Rest and SOAP ServicesliliAnalysis of user requirementsliliCode testing designing and rewriting as necessaryliliCreation of operational documentation with technical authorsliliWorking closely with other staff being a team player is a mustliliConsultation with clients and colleagues concerning the maintenance and performance of software systemsliulpstrongTechnical QualificationsstrongpulliPHPliliJavaScriptliliAWS Cloud9liliJSONliliXMLliliAPI DevelopmentConsumingliliRestliliSOAPliliSQL PostgreSQL experience is a plusliliObject Oriented Design PrincipalsliliCode DocumentationliliGIT RepositoryliliASPNet CliliMVC ArchitectureliliEntity FrameworkADONetliliVisual StudioliliBootstrapliliJQueryUIliulpstrongThe ideal candidate will also have experience withstrongpulliAndroid Mobile Application DevelopmentliliJIRAliliCSSliliHTML 5liulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBachelors degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldliliDevelopment experience with programming languagesliliSQL database or relational database skillsliul
